backend/main.mo: Main Internet Computer actor implementing registration submission/lookup, admin-only record retrieval, CMS content management (hero, about, event details, coordinators, contact), and gallery image storage, with role-based access control via MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the AdminLogin page update (pre-populating admin email 'athiakash1977@gmail.com') to its implementation file and associated components/test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of frontend source files to short descriptions summarizing each component or page's purpose and key features.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom properties for light and dark theme design tokens (colors, radius, chart, sidebar variables).
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React app titled 'National Level Project Expo 2026', mounting the app at `#root` and loading `src/main.tsx`.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app component configuring TanStack Router with hash-based history, all page routes, QueryClientProvider, and AdminAuthProvider.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: About section component with IntersectionObserver-triggered staggered bounce-in animations on feature cards and two drifting background glow orbs, fetching content from the backend.
frontend/src/components/AdminContentMana: CMS component with accordion-organized editable sections (Hero, About, Event Details, Coordinators, Contact) that fetch current backend content and provide save functionality via React Query mutations.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Renders the Contact section with animated cards showing address, phone, email, and website info fetched via a query hook, plus WhatsApp and Instagram social links.
frontend/src/components/Coordinators.tsx: Displays faculty and student coordinator cards with name, role, phone, and email, using intersection-observer-based scroll animations and data from a query hook.
frontend/src/components/EventDetails.tsx: Shows event details (date, venue, fee, eligibility, categories, timeline) in animated cards with data fetched via a query hook and fallback default content.
frontend/src/components/FloatingSocialBu: Fixed floating action buttons in the bottom-right corner linking to WhatsApp community and Instagram profile with hover tooltip labels.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer with brand info, social links, quick navigation links, and a scroll-to-top button, styled with a dark green gradient theme.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section featuring a typewriter text effect, live countdown timer to the event date, registration count stat, and parallax scroll effect, with content from query hooks.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with scroll-aware styling, active link highlighting, and a collapsible mobile menu using TanStack Router links.
frontend/src/components/ProtectedRoute.t: Route guard component that redirects unauthenticated users to the admin login page using the AdminAuthContext.
frontend/src/components/Registration.tsx: Registration form component that collects participant details, submits them via a mutation hook, and displays a success modal with a registration ID and UPI payment info.
frontend/src/components/ScrollProgressBa: Fixed top progress bar that visually indicates scroll depth on the page using a green gradient.
frontend/src/context/AdminAuthContext.ts: React context providing admin authentication state backed by sessionStorage, with login and logout functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (anonymous or authenticated) using the current Internet Identity, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Custom hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication via DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing identity, login/clear functions, and login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of TanStack Query hooks for reading and mutating backend data including registrations, admin verification, and CMS content (hero, about, event details, gallery, etc.).
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollAnimation.ts: Hook that uses IntersectionObserver to trigger fade-in or slide-up CSS animation classes when an element scrolls into view.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Poppins/Inter fonts, sets up Tailwind, defines CSS custom properties for a dark green-themed design system, and declares all keyframe animations used throughout the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the root component wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Standalone About page that composes Navbar, About section, Footer, floating social buttons, and a scroll progress bar.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Protected admin dashboard with tabs for managing event registrations (search, delete, CSV export) and a gallery (upload, delete images), plus an analytics card and content management section.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLogin.tsx: Admin login page with email/password form that verifies credentials against the backend and redirects to the dashboard on success, restricting access to a single designated admin email.
frontend/src/pages/EventDetailsPage.tsx: Standalone Event Details page that wraps the EventDetails component with Navbar, Footer, floating social buttons, and a scroll progress bar.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Gallery page that fetches and displays admin-uploaded images in a responsive grid with IntersectionObserver-driven fade-in animations, loading skeletons, and an empty state.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page that assembles all site sections—Hero, About, EventDetails, Coordinators, Registration, and Contact—with shared Navbar, Footer, and UI utilities.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: 404 error page with a styled alert icon, gradient heading, and a link back to the home page, using decorative background glow orbs.
frontend/src/pages/RegistrationLookupPag: A page that allows users to look up their registration status by entering an email address, displaying confirmation details or an error message based on the search result.
frontend/src/pages/RegistrationPage.tsx: A simple page wrapper that renders the Registration form component along with Navbar, Footer, ScrollProgressBar, and FloatingSocialButtons.
frontend/src/utils/csvExport.ts: Utility that converts an array of Registration objects into a CSV file and triggers a browser download with a date-stamped filename.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining dark mode, custom fonts (Poppins, Inter), OKLCH-based semantic color tokens, border radii, and a set of custom animations and keyframes.
project_state.json: Project state metadata file tracking the project name, existing features, pending admin email update requests, and architectural notes for the National Project Expo 2026 admin dashboard.
